queries.amount_sentence: Generate 10 sentences similar to "Für ärztliche Leistungen erlauben wir uns, Ihnen	28,78 EUR	zu berechnen." but instead of amount 28,78 EUR use <amount> tag. Only write answer, please do not write any other sentences.
queries.product_name:
Can you please write 10 medical services and their approximate prices (no real time prices just approximate values in €) in german language. Only write answer, please do not write any other sentences.
Some examples are: 
[Übungsbehandlung je Sitzung, 5 €]
 [Untersuchung symptombezogen, 4,77 €]
[Symptombezogene Untersuchung, 10,72 €]
[Magnetresonanztomographie eines oder mehrerer Gelenke oder Abschnitte von Extremitäten, 321,75 €]
[Sonographie je Organ bis zu drei, 26,81 €]
